      • shouldNeverExpand

        public boolean shouldNeverExpand()
        Description copied from interface: FoldRegion
        If true, this region is always in a collapsed state, FoldRegion.setExpanded(boolean) does nothing for it. No marker is displayed in gutter for such a region.
        Specified by:
        shouldNeverExpand in interface FoldRegion
        See Also:
        FoldingModelEx.createFoldRegion(int, int, String, FoldingGroup, boolean)

      • setInnerHighlightersMuted

        public void setInnerHighlightersMuted(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: FoldRegion
        If inner highlighters are muted for a collapsed fold region, there will be no visual indication that region contains certain highlighters inside. By default such indication is added.
        Specified by:
        setInnerHighlightersMuted in interface FoldRegion
        See Also:
        RangeHighlighterEx.isVisibleIfFolded()

      • setGutterMarkEnabledForSingleLine

        public void setGutterMarkEnabledForSingleLine(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: FoldRegion
        By default, gutter mark (for collapsing/expanding the region using mouse) is not shown for a folding region, if it's contained within a single document line. This method allows to change this behaviour for given fold region.
        Specified by:
        setGutterMarkEnabledForSingleLine in interface FoldRegion
        See Also:
        FoldRegion.isGutterMarkEnabledForSingleLine(), EditorSettings.setAllowSingleLogicalLineFolding(boolean)

      • isGutterMarkEnabledForSingleLine

      • setPlaceholderText

        public void setPlaceholderText(java.lang.String text)
        Description copied from interface: FoldRegion
        Updates region's placeholder text. Should be called inside FoldingModel.runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable), like any other operations with fold regions.
        Specified by:
        setPlaceholderText in interface FoldRegion
